name: Rustled Pete
description:
Rustled Pete is a boss fighting platformer. Do you have what it takes to show Pete who's the real boss?

Gameplay
  • You only have one life, but I'm sure you will manage!
  • Accumulate your combo counter and time your attacks to deal devastating blows to Pete!

I made some tools for you to stun Pete with, he doesn't like that at all!


Unlock new Pete Forms, and test your skills as he becomes angrier and angrier in each form!


I could make you more tools to make your life a bit easier, but who are we kidding? You will die a lot any way!
